programme.title: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: It’s estimated that roughly 10,000 people are wrongfully convicted in the U.S. each and every year for crimes they didn’t commit. These wrongful convictions mean that the real perpetrators may still be out there and that we all lose when the criminal justice system we rely on becomes corrupt.

programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: Benelli Presents: Donnie Vincent’s Winds of Adak
programme.desc: In November of 2019, explorer and hunter Donnie Vincent traveled to Adak Island, Alaska. Located at the westernmost end in the Aleutian chain, Adak is wilderness with the exception of a now-abandoned naval base that once housed more than 6,000 people. Winds of Adak chronicles Donnie’s exploration of the island, a hauntingly desolate abandoned military outpost and three unique hunts—caribou, ptarmigan and sea ducks—as the unforgiving elements, the terrain and the Bering Sea test both man and equipment.

programme.title: Silver Kings S6:E3 "Shake N Bake"
programme.desc: Jared is joined by well known tarpon angler Baker Bishop in Islamorada.

programme.title: Silver Kings S6:E4 "Bridges"
programme.desc: Jared and Brent Flack-Davidson, from New York, battle it out with a beast in Islamorada.

programme.title: Rack Daddies S5:E3 "Pennsylvania Opener"
programme.desc: As the guys prep for the PA archery season, we welcome two new members onto the team, Tyler Maiman and Trey Pritchard! That magical opening day morning arrives and an awesome PA buck is knocked down. Trevor and Townsley are putting some time in the stand and Trevor knocks down his first deer with his bow ever!

programme.title: Rack Daddies S5:E4 "Eastern Shore Part I"
programme.desc: Its the opening weekend on the Eastern Shore but there’s just one problem, Hurricane Dorian is about to hit the coast. The guys brave the storm as they hunt in very windy conditions, then Trey manages to send a meat missile through his biggest buck to date!

programme.title: Rack Daddies S5:E5 "2019 Squirrel Classic"
programme.desc: The Squirrel Classic has long been a tradition with Rack Daddies, dating back to Season One. This year however, we stepped it up BIG TIME, inviting 4 teams to compete in the annual competition to fight for the title of Squirrel Classic Champion 2019!! Lots of fun, lots of laughs and lots of squirrels to chase!

programme.title: No Limits Hunting S7:E3 "Black Gold"

programme.title: No Limits Hunting S7:E4 "Bows and Guns"
programme.desc: Alexis, Greg Mott and Matt Jensen are back in South Africa Hunting at Limcroma Safaris.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E3 "If This Boat Could Talk"
programme.desc: Ali and Rush head to Guatemala to fish with David Salazar at Casa Vieja Lodge aboard the latest addition to the fleet. If this boat could talk, the tales of record breaking fish and world travels would be endless and Dave’s big plans for it are sure to make for an exciting new chapter.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E4 "Gulffish”
programme.desc: The boys are back in the Florida Keys fishing with Capt. Tony Murphy from the Saltwater Angler tackle shop in Key West aboard his 32’ SeaVee. Tony takes the boys into the Gulf of Mexico to chase Permit on wrecks using live crabs for bait. The Gulf doesn’t disappoint and also provides plenty of action from other Florida Keys species.

programme.title: Into the Blue S13:E3 "Wrecks of Hawks Cay"

programme.title: Into the Blue S13:E4 "Key West Yellowtailin"
programme.desc: Targeting Yellowtail Snapper in Key West is the perfect way to start any trip.

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E2 "Last Ditch Effort"

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E3 "We Got 99 Problems"

programme.title: The Raven Project S1:E1 "Raven Show One Alpha"

programme.title: Collin Moulton - Anti-Animal Vegan
programme.desc: Collin is one of the most fun, personable, and sought after headliners today. He has had his own stand-up special on SHOWTIME, he's been on NICKELODEON, and was recently featured on LAST CALL WITH CARSON DALY. Touring for over 15 years Collin has gained an ease and enjoyment on stage that makes every show worth watching.America knows and loves him. His familiarity and energy engages and relieves the audience before he even speaks. His electric storytelling style makes you care about every topic he explores. Collin's comedy is the release needed from our every day lives. Come needing to laugh tonight, leave wanting to laugh forever!Collin Moulton

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jordan Makin - The BFFG
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Ron Ruhman - Weird Stuff
programme.desc: Ron has been called a “High Energy Seinfeld”. He brings a very energetic style to the stage as he shares his interesting slant on day-to-day life in an act that is clean, smart, and very entertaining.

programme.title: James Johann - Rurally Funny
programme.desc: James' childhood upbringing was significantly influenced by country music, countless bad hair cuts, and Catholic school. In 1991, James began his stand-up career in Kansas City. Today, James is a long-time veteran of the stand-up comedy circuit, performing at clubs across the country. His self-deprecating sense of humor and high energy style come together to create a unique onstage persona. James relies more on his brain than the profane and his comedy is a truthful and hilarious reflection of life as he sees it.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Aaron Woodall - Sad and Needy
programme.desc: Between his first and second special, Aaron Woodalls perspective transitioned from a nice young man coming to grips with a dirty, cynical world to a deeper introspection of his own upbringing and biases.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Tom Ryan - Off The Verge
programme.desc: Over the years Tom Ryan has worked steadily at comedy clubs, concert venues, corporate functions and colleges across the U.S.. He has also made national television appearances on Showtime, A&E Comedy Central, and… Three times on “The Late Show with David Letterman!”. He has performed as the opening act in concert for: B.B. King, Tim Allen, Steven Wright, Natalie Cole, and Dennis Miller just to name a few. He has contributed monologue jokes to the award winning "Politically Incorrect with Bill Maher" and regularly headlines corporate events for companies ranging from Coca-Cola to Church and Dwight. Tom believes that the best comedy comes from the most unlikely sources.

programme.title: Bob Smiley - Tartar Terrorist

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Josh Sneed - Live in the Dessert

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Steve Soelberg - Pirate Hymns

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:BT - My Life As I Know It Now

His physical performance style and charm landed him two performances on NBC's Friday Night Videos and a performance at the prestigious HBO U.S. Comedy Arts Festival. B.T. has also appeared on BET’s Comic View, MTV's The Jenny McCarthy Show, and FOX's The Keenan Ivory Wayans Show.

Nominated as one of NBC’s Stand Up for Diversity top comics Arvin continues to tour colleges, clubs, cruise ships & churches.

These parts of animals are almost completely absent from modern day diets and these provided much more nutrition than just the animal's meat.
